backend/main.mo: Defines core data types for programs, KPIs, users, and agendas, and provides comparison utilities along with integrated authorization mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping UI changes to affected frontend files, components, and related requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their functionality across the app.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and OKLCH-based light/dark theme variables for the application.
frontend/index.html: Simple HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Handles authentication flow, profile setup gating, and renders either login, setup modal, or dashboard.
frontend/src/components/DashboardOvervie: Displays program and KPI metrics with charts, progress data, and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/DeleteConfirmDia: Reusable confirmation dialog component for delete actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with attribution and external link branding.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with logo, user info, theme toggle, and logout handling using user profile and identity hooks.
frontend/src/components/KpiFormDialog.ts: Provides a dialog form for creating or updating a KPI, handling form state, validation, and mutation submissions.
frontend/src/components/KPIsTab.tsx: Displays KPI management table with filtering, creation, editing, and deletion logic, using KPI- and program-related queries.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Shows a mandatory modal for new users to enter their name and role, then saves the profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/program-calendar: Shows a small legend mapping calendar event categories to their display colors.
Utility functions for category colors and counting program, agenda, and KPI occurrences per day.
Renders a clickable calendar day cell showing the date and category color bars based on program, agenda, and KPI counts.
Displays a side or bottom sheet listing all programs active on a selected day with status, priority, and basic details.
Provides buttons to toggle between comfortable and compact calendar grid spacing.
Button group allowing users to switch between month, week, day, and agenda calendar views.
Shows detailed program information in a drawer, including timeline, PIC info, status, priority, and edit support.
Provides filtering logic for programs and a helper to count active programs on a given day.
Maps status and priority values to display labels and style configurations.
Generates a 14‑day agenda list combining programs, agenda items, and KPIs, grouped by day with click handling for programs.
Builds a day view list by collecting and sorting programs, agenda items, and KPI deadlines occurring on the selected date and renders them with basic metadata.
Generates a full month grid with weekday headers and day cells, computing per‑day category counts for programs, agenda, and KPIs.
Creates a week grid view by listing each day of the week and displaying category counts for programs, agenda, and KPIs.
frontend/src/components/ProgramCalendarT: Implements a program calendar with multiple views, filtering, reminders, and range-based data queries for programs, agendas, and KPIs.
frontend/src/components/ProgramFormDialo: Form dialog for creating or editing a program, managing form state and submitting mutations with division-based PIC selection.
frontend/src/components/programs/Program: Renders a clickable program card with priority/status badges, details, and optional edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/ProgramsTab.tsx: Provides a programs management interface with search, filters, sorting, CRUD operations, and detail viewing via dialogs and drawers.
frontend/src/components/RelatedProgramCo: Renders a searchable popover combobox for selecting a related program from a provided list.
frontend/src/components/ReportsTab.tsx: Generates filtered program and KPI reports with export functionality and dynamic team/division filters.
frontend/src/components/TeamMemberFormDi: Dialog form for creating or editing team members, handling submit logic for both modes.
frontend/src/components/TeamMembersTab.t: Displays and filters team members with search, division filters, and create/edit/delete actions.
Admin-only interface for listing users and updating their roles with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and maintains a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
Periodically checks upcoming program, agenda, and KPI times to trigger deduplicated toast reminders at 24h and 3h intervals.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and persisted identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Returns a boolean indicating whether a given CSS media query currently matches, updating reactively on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and mutate user profiles, roles, admin status, and programs via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode styles, and utility animations for UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the dashboard with tabbed navigation, conditionally showing admin tabs based on caller permissions.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements a login screen using Internet Identity with styled components and loading feedback.
frontend/src/utils/reminderDedup.ts: Handles deduplication of calendar reminders using localStorage with timestamp-based expiry.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugin integrations for the project.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state for redesigning the Program Calendar, including UX goals, architectural notes, known issues, and a list of existing calendar‑related features. Serves as a planning reference for UI improvements, data wiring, and interaction requirements.
